name: .GTX
summary: Learn about .GTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: GTX files are not meant to be opened by players. However, you can use the player-created GTX Extractor application to convert GTX files to .DDS files, and vice versa.
You can use GTX Extractor (multiplatform) to convert GTX files to the .DDS format. You can then open the converted file in any image viewer or editor that supports the DDS format.
